name: It Lurks in the Dark
description:
Story

Locked in a cellar and told to record everything or die as a sick joke, you must find a means to escape while not being found by it.

Dwindling stamina and battery for your flashlight mean it's only a matter of time before it gets you. Can you find the keys to the cellar's lock and escape in time?

Key Features

Without revealing too much...

  • Randomized level layout for added replay-ability
  • Emphasis on atmosphere and not jump scare
  • In-game timer for speed running

This game was made as a fun side-project from October 3, 2019 - October 27, 2019. Thanks to Rachel and Chase for helping to test it!
